column5: Hey Y'all 5 buddies & I are scheduled for our Nip Trip Jan 26-28 @ Rob Hyatt's - is anybody else going to be up there? Cheers! Ted
Hey Terry! Thanks! How was your season? Are you hitting Nip this year? Ted
I'll  be there the weekend after your trip. Good luck dude. Leave some pickerel for me.  Corn Nug
I won't be there, but have a great trip and bring us back some pics to add to your report.
hey Ted the date I booked for Nip has come and gone and there was no ice........I hope to get there next year

Terry: So sorry to hear of your missed trip...we where real concerned when we where up north new years day - morning and I was sitting on a cottage deck overlooking open water on the lake, coffee in hand wearing golf shirt & shorts! The sun had warmed the deck to +13c! Unbelievable...  Rob says ice is getting good now.

We just got back from Promised Land Camp.  Good news is the ice is nice and solid, 8"-10" where our hut was...  ...bad news is we couldn't catch many fish, a few perch and a couple of herring was all we could manage. Still had a blast though...Frank & Claire run a 1st Class operation.
I'll probably be out at the French River around Campbells Bay by next week-end or so.
Hope you have a good time Ted - like Terry said - we gambled & booked for the 1st weekend & the house won
